thread.section_title: Shop Orthopedics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Shop Orthopedics | shop-orthopedics.com
thread.title: Bernadette K
thread.title_full: Shop Orthopedics reviewed by Bernadette K

author: Bernadette K
title: Bernadette K
text:
This company carried the Breg Rooster brace that I was looking for but I had to order online so was not sure of sizing. They worked with me to find the correct sizing and I received the brace overnight as I live about 11/2 hours from the shop.
Steve was very professional and knowledgeable about the brace and he exceeded my expectations in customer service. Also, it was actually nice to speak to a person and the same one for the 3 times that I called. Awesome customer service!!!
